Uses of Class
suncertify.db.RecordNotFoundException

  • Packages that use RecordNotFoundException 
    Package Description
    suncertify.db
    The database package for the URLyBird Application.
    suncertify.rmi
    The RMI package contains the networking parts of the URLyBird Application.

    • Uses of RecordNotFoundException in suncertify.db

      Methods in suncertify.db that throw RecordNotFoundException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DBAccess.deleteRecord(long recNo, long lockCookie) 
      void Data.deleteRecord(long recNo, long lockCookie)
      Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage unavailable for reuse by setting an "invalid" flag for the record.
      long DBAccess.lockRecord(long recNo) 
      long Data.lockRecord(long recNo)
      Locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client.
      java.lang.String[] DBAccess.readRecord(long recNo) 
      java.lang.String[] Data.readRecord(long recNo)
      Reads a record from the file.
      void DBAccess.updateRecord(long recNo, java.lang.String[] data, long lockCookie) 
      void Data.updateRecord(long recNo, java.lang.String[] data, long lockCookie)
      Modifies the fields of a record.
